articles.author: Arslan Ali
articles.title: Natural Gas and Oil Forecast: WTI Nears $83.50; Bearish Correction Ahead? - FX Empire
articles.description: Natural gas dips to $2.46 while WTI nears $83.50, prompting analysts to warn of possible market correction driven by rate cut speculation and storm threats.
articles.content: Natural Gas (NG) is trading at $2.46, marking a decrease of 0.44%. Analyzing the 2-hour chart, the current pivot point is precisely at $2.46. Resistance levels are set at $2.53, $2.59, and $2.64, res… [+498 chars]

articles.author: Alun John, Kevin Buckland
articles.title: Elections in focus as French stocks fall, US yields stay higher - Reuters
articles.description: European stocks dipped on Tuesday, reversing some of the previous day's relief rally, while the U.S. dollar hit a near 38-year high versus the Japanese yen as the possibility of a second Donald Trump presidency left Treasury yields elevated.

articles.title: DNEG Group agrees $200 million investment from UASG - DNEG

articles.title: Project Nexus completes comprehensive blueprint for connecting domestic instant payment systems globally and prepares for work towards live implementation - bis.org
articles.description:
Nexus is a BIS Innovation Hub project that seeks to enhance cross-border payments by connecting multiple domestic instant payment systems (IPS) globally.
It is the first BIS Innovation Hub project in the payments area to move towards live implementation. BIS…
